```
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:latest
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password
      - MYSQL_ROOT_HOST=localhost
    ports:
      - 3306:3306
    volumes:
      - db:/var/lib/mysql
    networks:
      - network

volumes:
  db:
    driver: local

networks:
  network:
    driver: bridge
```

```
docker run --net mynet --ip 10.5.0.1 -p 3306:3306 --mount source=db,target=/var/lib/mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password mysql:latest
```

```
services:
  db:
    container_name: mysql_db
    image: mysql:latest
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password
      - MYSQL_ROOT_HOST=10.5.0.1
    ports:
      - 3306:3306
    volumes:
      - db:/var/lib/mysql
      - ./init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql
    networks:
      network:
        ipv4_address: 10.5.0.5

volumes:
  db:
    driver: local

networks:
  network:
    driver: bridge
    ipam:
      config:
        - subnet: 10.5.0.0/16
          gateway: 10.5.0.1
```
